title: Three Challenges for Bret Weinstein's Quest for a New Religion
description:
I did a "ThinkClub debate" with Adam and he felt I straw-manned Bret Weinstein in my last video. How IDW unbecoming! So I wanted to go deeper into the challenges I see with what I perceive as Bret Weinstein's naturalism. There seems to be a new dawning among Naturalists that religion is the only competent vehicle that could grapple with the challenges (environmental, social, political, etc.) that we fear will destroy life on this planet. What would such a new religion require? Does naturalism have what it takes to satisfy those religious requirements? 

My video on Bret Weinstein's proposal as a new religion. https://youtu.be/ymKC3b83sqo
My ThinkClub debate with Adam https://youtu.be/6bZhJ8lMjT4
Unbelievable with Bret Weinstein Pt. 1 https://youtu.be/kRx2uNMJFnU
Unbelievable with Bret Weinstein Pt.2 https://youtu.be/Bbw1xjxfL38
Jeff Q Looks for a Spiritual Solution https://youtu.be/yDOqQv6wUg8
Vervaeke Awakening from the Meaning Crisis https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ
Mary Kochan is Vervaeke trying to destroy religion https://youtu.be/W3r8Z9y5UIc
Durkheim on Religion http://www.faculty.rsu.edu/users/f/felwell/www/Theorists/Essays/Durkheim2.htm
The Metaphysical Club https://amzn.to/30dgFZ4
CS Lewis Miracles https://amzn.to/30ezQ3F
Bret on Dax Shepherd Podcast https://armchairexpertpod.com/pods/bret-weinstein
A Quality Existence with Vervaeke https://youtu.be/8d2vlpieEH8
Brave New World https://amzn.to/2LGmvJo
The Matrix Movie https://amzn.to/34XY7dM
Was Calvin a Calvinist? Richard Muller https://wscal.edu/resource-center/was-calvin-a-calvinist
Alvin Plantinga Where the Conflict Really Lies https://amzn.to/351E2DI
